name: CatholicPrayers(Spanish)
0:
caret
”Alexa, open catholic prayers spanish”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers spanish to do hail mary”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers spanish to pick a prayer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: catholic prayers spanish
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Disclaimer: The prayers are presented in Spanish visually and audibly.

Have your Alexa say a prayer for you anytime you like. Just ask it to say a prayer from the list below or you can ask it to pick one for you by saying "pick a prayer."

You can also listen to all the prayers with two other voices: Father David and Sister Angie.

List of Prayers:

La Señal de la Cruz (The Sign of the Cross in Spanish)
Padre Nuestro (Our Father/The Lord's Prayer in Spanish)
Ave María (Hail Mary in Spanish)
Gloria (Glory Be in Spanish)
El Credo de los Apóstol (The Apostle's Creed in Spanish)
Salve Santa Reina (Hail Holy Queen in Spanish)
Anima Christi (in Spanish)
Memorare (in Spanish)
El Ángelus (The Angelus in Spanish)
Oración de San Miguel (Saint Michael Prayer in Spanish)
Acto de Contrición (Act of Contrition in Spanish)
Poder de medalla milagroso (Miraculous Medal Power in Spanish)
Ofrenda de la mañana (Morning Offering in Spanish)
Oración del Ángel Guardián (Guardian Angel Prayer in Spanish)
Gracia antes de las comidas (Grace Before Meals in Spanish)
Gracia después de las comidas (Grace After Meals in Spanish)
La oración del ángel (Angel's Prayer in Spanish)
Oración a San José (Pray to Saint Joseph in Spanish)
El Rosario (The Rosary in Spanish)
El Rosario (Abridged) (The Rosary in Spanish)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
